data.title: Residencia Real Castillo de Curiel in Curiel de Duero. Official Website.
data.meta_description: Residencia Real Castillo de Curiel  in Curiel de Duero. Official Website. 4 star  located on Calle Trascastillo, S/N, Curiel de Duero. Book online for lowest rates.
data.text:
Every guest room in the hotel is personalized and dedicated to a historical personage who lived or was proprietor of the castle in the Middle Ages. Along with the keys when our guests check-in they receive a short history of these historical figures.

Our delicate and exquisite service will make your stay unforgettable: fruit assortment and welcome cocktail, generous breakfast buffet, 24 hour room service, bicycles, visits to wineries and excursions to the Duero's valley, wine tasting, astronomical observations, solarium and outdoor swimming pool and showers (in season), television and direct dial telephone in every room, electronic safe, hair dryer, automatized lavatories, amenities, remote-controlled personal air conditioning, etc... all these services and activities are included in your room's rate.

Car park: you can leave your vehicule right at the main entrance of the hotel.

We can also arrange for you falconry exhibitions, horse riding and minibus excursions to nearby monuments and castles.
